review: We have reaped the benefits of the Fire TV Stick almost everynight since we got it.  We have chosen not to add Netflix or HULU so I can not comment on the way it works for those users but for straight Prime it is great.  I read in reviews that some had experienced streaming delays but we have had no issues.  I would recommend this product.

review: Love it so far but wish it did not need to be plugged in. (I understand most do not)  My TV hangs high on the wall and is very large.
